name: Blue Witch vs. the Knights
description:
You must fight off your foes using only your defensive magic. Your shield accumulates energy from hits and releases it from time to time. Use this burst of energy or bounce arrows on your shield to defeat enemies.

Use WASD/ZQSD to move

Use O/P or Left/Right to rotate

Made for GMTK Jam 2018 following the theme "Genre without mechanic".

Coding by Twelve O'Thirteen / Graphics and sound by Sarcelle Cannelle

Arc collider 2D script by GuyQuad
